# default()

**Type Method**

Returns an instance of the default media library.

## Declaration

```swift
class func `default`() -> MPMediaLibrary
```

## Return Value

The user’s default media library.

## Getting the default media library

- **requestAuthorization(_:)**: Displays a user interface so that the user can authorize whether your app may view the media library’s contents.
- **authorizationStatus()**: Returns whether the app can access the user’s media library.
- **MPMediaLibraryAuthorizationStatus**: The list of possible states for authorization to access to the user’s media library.
